channel.title: 共享文件夹 on Song's Blog

item.title: Samba在linux上的使用
item.author: Mr.heesong@gmail.com (Song)
item.description: 1.安装 sudo yum -y install samba 2.配置 /etc/samba/smb.conf eg: [global] workgroup = Administrators netblos name = server string = Linux Samba Server TestServer security = share display charset=UTF-8 unix charset=UTF-8 dos charset=UTF-8 [share] #====>windows下显示的共享文件夹名字：sha
